summary.span: 支持 控件并为数据绑定控件提供一个接口，以便对关系数据库执行 SQL 数据操作。

span.span: Supports the control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform SQL data operations against relational databases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类主要用于通过数据绑定控件，而不是作为页面代码中的可编程对象使用。The class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls, and not as a programmable object in page code. ASP.NET 数据源控件包含一个或多个数据源视图对象所表示的数据列表。ASP.NET data source controls contain one or more lists of data, represented by data source view objects. 类用于扩展类中定义的功能控件与它相关联，并实现数据源控件的基本数据功能。The class extends the class, defines the capabilities of the control with which it is associated, and implements the basic data functionality for the data source control. 类实现的数据功能控件，其中包括， ， ，并操作，排序、 筛选和管理视图中保存的设置状态。The class implements the data functionality for the control, including the , , , and operations, sorting, filtering, and managing settings that are kept in view state. 尽管对象不直接公开到由页面开发人员控件，许多其属性都是。Although the object is not directly exposed to page developers by the control, many of its properties are. 数据源视图执行的最基本操作是从基础数据库使用的数据检索方法，检索数据项的集合。The most basic operation that a data source view performs is data retrieval from the underlying database using the method, which retrieves an collection of data items. 类实现从关系数据库使用 SQL 查询检索数据。The class implements data retrieval from relational databases using SQL queries. 以获得更大的灵活性和安全性，可以参数化 SQL 查询。The SQL queries can be parameterized for greater flexibility and security. 通过实现以下数据检索方法、 属性和事件并直接通过公开其向页面开发人员和其他调用方的控件：The following data retrieval methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event 对象支持更新关系数据库使用 SQL 命令中的数据。The object supports updating data in a relational database using SQL commands. 以获得更大的灵活性和安全性，可以参数化 SQL 命令。The SQL commands can be parameterized for greater flexibility and security. 数据绑定控件，如并，可以配置为执行使用自动更新，而其他控件不能。Data-bound controls, such as the and , can be configured to perform updates automatically using the , while other controls cannot. 通过实现下列更新方法、 属性和事件并直接通过公开其向页面开发人员和其他调用方的控件：The following update methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event 支持将新的数据行插入到关系数据库。The supports inserting new rows of data into a relational database. 中指定的 SQL 命令属性可以参数化以获得更大的灵活性和安全性。The SQL commands that are specified in the property can be parameterized for greater flexibility and security. 数据绑定控件，如并，可以配置为执行自动使用插入，而其他控件不能。Data-bound controls, such as the and , can be configured to perform inserts automatically using the , while other controls cannot. 以下插入方法、 属性和事件由实现并直接通过公开其向页面开发人员和其他调用方的控件：The following insert methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event 对象还支持从关系数据库中删除数据。The object also supports deleting data from a relational database. 与其他命令一样的 SQL 命令中指定属性可以参数化以获得更大的灵活性和安全性。As with other commands, the SQL commands that are specified in the property can be parameterized for greater flexibility and security. 数据绑定控件，如并，可以配置为执行删除操作会自动使用，而其他控件不能。Data-bound controls, such as the and , can be configured to perform deletes automatically using the , while other controls cannot. 下列删除方法、 属性和事件由实现并直接通过公开其向页面开发人员和其他调用方的控件：The following delete methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event 动态用于在数据检索期间对数据进行筛选的子句时，数据检索是功能更强大。Data retrieval is more powerful when the clause that is used to filter the data during data retrieval is dynamic. 换而言之，SQL 查询使用静态其中子句不是为灵活且功能强大的 SQL 查询作为其中的 WHERE 子句中的值绑定到可以更改，如 Web 窗体页上的控件中显示的值的值。In other words, an SQL query with a static WHERE clause is not as flexible and powerful as an SQL query where the values in the WHERE clause are bound to values that can change, such as values that are displayed in controls on a Web Forms page. 而不是重新生成 SQL 查询和设置每个页面加载的属性，可以使用和属性应用到数据检索动态筛选。Instead of rebuilding an SQL query and setting the property on every page load, you can use the and properties to apply dynamic filtering to data retrieval. 这些属性由实现并直接通过公开其向数据绑定控件和其他调用方的控件。These properties are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to data-bound controls and other callers. 您可以检索与数据进行排序通过添加一个 ORDER BY 子句，这会导致数据库以执行检索数据时，排序或通过对数据进行排序在内存中检索到的控件。You can sort the data that you retrieve with the control by adding an ORDER BY clause, which causes the database to perform the ordering for you when you retrieve data or by ordering the data in memory after it is retrieved. 你可以提供到排序表达式通过设置的属性对象传递给方法。You can supply a sorting expression to the by setting the property of the object that is passed to the method. 语法属性是相同的语法属性。The syntax for the property is the same as the syntax for a property. 如果使用存储的过程来检索数据，还可以使用属性指定一个参数，它专门用于对存储的过程调用的结果进行排序。If you use a stored procedure to retrieve data, you can also use the property to specify a parameter that is used specifically for sorting the results of a stored procedure call. 如果多个用户可以同时更改的数据库，则并发冲突的可能性。When more than one user can change the database concurrently, there is the potential for concurrency conflict. 控件具有通过控件并发属性。The control has controls concurrency through the property. 在中实现的功能属性。The functionality is implemented in the property. 与许多其他 Web 服务器控件一样实现接口并使用视图状态来跟踪跨页请求其状态。Like many other Web server controls, the implements the interface and uses view state to track its state across page requests. 实现和属性和， ，和提供方法来启用该控件的视图状态跟踪。Implementations of the and property and the , , and methods are provided to enable view state tracking for the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置值，该值指示操作期间基础数据库中的一行数据更改时， 控件如何执行更新和删除。

span.span: Gets or sets the value indicating how the control performs updates and deletes when data in a row in the underlying database changes during the time of the operation.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认为 值。

span.span: The default is the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否将旧的和新值的参数应用于`Update`方法。The property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the `Update` method. 例如，如果该命令是指定属性返回对象包含列`Name`和`Number`，并属性设置为值，用于创建参数`Name`和`Number`更新操作。For example, if the command that is specified by the property returns a object with the columns `Name` and `Number`, and the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the update operation. 如果属性设置为值，用于创建参数`Name`， `Number`， `original_Name`，并`original_Number`。If the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Number`. (取决于原始值的参数的确切名称。)然后，将对象确定方法是否在指定属性具有相匹配的参数。(The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the .) Then, the object determines if the method that is specified in the property has parameters that match. 并发控制是数据存储区使用的控件如何读取和在多个客户端访问和操作同一数据存储区中更改数据的技术。Concurrency control is a technique data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data. 例如，一个客户端读取数据并呈现给用户，而另一个客户端读取相同的数据，并呈现给其他用户。For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data, and presents it to a different user. 如果两个用户更新的数据，并将其提交到数据存储，则可能会出现某种意外的结果，因为两个客户端可能会更新相同数据的不同值。If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, some unexpected result might occur, because both clients might update different values for the same data. 这被视为冲突。This is considered a conflict. 通过设置属性设置为值，更新操作然后可以比较旧和新值传递到原始的数据源，以检测冲突并根据需要处理它们。By setting the property to the value, the update operation can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them as required. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象用于从基础数据库中删除数据的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the uses to delete data from the underlying database.

value.span: 删除数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to delete data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序，这是默认提供程序类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符是`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称如果基础数据库支持的存储的过程。The can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the underlying database supports stored procedures. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置Northwind 数据库 Orders 表中删除一个订单的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database Orders table. 从订单表中检索数据并将其显示在控件。Data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 呈现**删除**自动按钮时属性设置为`true`自动填充集合并调用方法时**删除**单击按钮。The renders a **Delete** button automatically when the property is set to `true` and automatically populates the collection and calls the method when the **Delete** button is clicked. 最后，此示例将删除数据，因为事件处理程序添加了尝试进行数据库备份到磁盘删除操作之前执行。Finally, because this example deletes data, an event handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the delete operation is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/CS/sql10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/VB/sql10vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性包含的参数化的 SQL 查询集合包含任何对应的 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符的对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 参数名称可能会受到属性; 具体而言，如果名称标识为主键，如密钥的指定，则使用`DataKeyNames`属性数据绑定控件，或在删除和更新情况下， 属性设置为值和一系列`oldValues`传递到相应的数据方法。Parameter names might be affected by the property; specifically, if the name identifies a primary key, such as a key that is specified using the `DataKeyNames` property of a data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios in which the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` is passed to the corresponding data method. 在这种情况下，格式字符串应用于在每个参数名称`oldValues`集合。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 具体取决于 ADO.NET 提供程序中的参数的顺序集合可能会很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供程序将根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中显示的顺序集合中的参数相关联。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order that the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序，这是默认的 ADO.NET 提供程序为控件，将集合中的参数匹配的参数名称的 SQL 查询中的占位符 with 相关联。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with the placeholder in the SQL query. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置文本从 Northwind 数据库中删除订单。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to delete an order from the Northwind database. 最初，从订单表中检索数据并显示在控件。Initially, data is retrieved from the Orders table and displayed in a control. 必须显式声明属性并调用方法时使用数据绑定控件，如(与控件不同，如和，这会自动填充参数和调用上数据源控件的方法)。You must explicitly declare the property and call the method when using data-bound controls, such as the (unlike controls, such as the and , which automatically populate the parameters and call the method on a data source control). 在此示例中，事件委托给私有事件处理程序，显式调用方法的控件。In this example, the event is delegated to the private event handler, which explicitly calls the method of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/CS/sql11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_11sql/VB/sql11vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来执行特定于应用程序，以验证参数的值或更改之前的参数值的附加的初始化操作控件执行删除操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the delete operation. 与基础数据源的连接尚未打开，调用事件处理程序委托时。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，不能取消操作直接通过调用方法对象，它公开由对象。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 但是，可以通过设置取消该操作的属性到`true`。You can, however, cancel the operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理之前执行删除操作引发的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event that is raised before a delete operation occurs. 因为此示例从 Northwind 数据库中，将删除数据添加处理程序，以尝试进行数据库备份到磁盘之前执行删除操作。Because this example deletes data from the Northwind database, an handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the delete operation is performed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/CS/sql10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_10sql/VB/sql10vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现继承方法从数据库中删除数据。The class implements the inherited method to delete data from a database. 页面开发人员和数据绑定控件作者不调用方法直接; 相反，使用公开提供方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 中包含的值`keys`集合进行求值和所包含的所有值都合并集合。The values that are contained in the `keys` collection are evaluated and merged with any values that are contained by the collection. 如果属性设置为值时中, 包含的值`oldValues`集合都将使用属性并合并。If the property is set to the value, the values that are contained in the `oldValues` collection are formatted with the property and are also merged. 执行删除操作之前，请方法调用以引发事件。Before the delete operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件来检查参数的值并执行之前删除任何预处理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a delete. 若要执行删除操作，对象生成对象使用文本和任何关联属性，然后执行对基础数据库对象。To perform a delete operation, the object builds a object using the text and any associated properties, and then executes the object against the underlying database. 在删除操作完成后，方法调用以引发事件。After the delete operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件来检查任何返回值和错误代码并执行所有后期处理步骤。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现继承方法以从数据库中检索数据。The class implements the inherited method to retrieve data from a database. 页面开发人员和数据绑定控件作者不调用方法直接; 相反，使用公开提供方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 执行数据检索之前，请方法调用以引发事件。Before the data retrieval is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 可以处理此事件来检查参数的值并执行任何预处理之前检索数据。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before data is retrieved. 若要执行此操作，对象生成对象使用文本和任何关联，并执行针对基础数据库。To perform the operation, the object builds a object using the text and any associated , and executes it against the underlying database. 在操作完成后，方法调用以引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理此事件，以检查任何返回值，错误代码，并执行所有后期处理步骤。You can handle this event to examine any return values, error codes, and perform any post-processing. 方法将返回对象如果设置为，或对象如果设置为。The method returns a object if the is set to , or a object if the is set to . 关闭对象读取数据完成。Close the object when you have finished reading the data. 如果设置为并且启用缓存，则将从其中检索数据和数据操作期间将数据保存到缓存。If the is set to and caching is enabled, the retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the data operation. 创建缓存，放弃或刷新基于指定的组合的缓存行为和属性。The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed based on the caching behavior specified by the combination of the and properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当使用 Windows 身份验证下的客户端模拟时，在第一个用户访问数据时缓存数据。When you are using client impersonation under Windows authentication, the data is cached when the first user accesses the data. 如果另一个用户请求相同的数据，从缓存检索数据。If another user requests the same data, the data is retrieved from the cache. 不可以执行另一个调用到数据库，以验证用户的访问权限的数据检索的数据。The data is not retrieved by making another call to the database to verify the user's access to the data. 如果希望多个用户访问数据，并且您希望每个检索到的数据库的安全配置验证的数据，不使用缓存。If you expect multiple users to access the data, and you want each retrieval to the data to be verified by the database's security configurations, do not use caching. 如果设置为和一个已指定，以及提供的所有计算和数据检索操作过程生成的筛选器应用于数据的列表。If the is set to and a has been specified, it is evaluated along with any supplied and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the data retrieval operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关使用的语法属性是一种格式字符串样式语法。The syntax that is used for the property is a format string–style syntax. 可以包括在参数属性。You can include parameters in the property. 如果参数的类型为字符串或字符，将参数括在单引号内。If the type of the parameter is string or character, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果参数的数值类型，则不需要，引号引起来。Quotation marks are not required, if the parameter is a numeric type. 集合中包含的参数，其计算结果中找到占位符属性。The collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders that are found in the property. 控件支持筛选数据时，才在`DataSet`模式。The control supports filtering data only when in `DataSet` mode. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应验证从客户端接收任何筛选器参数值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 在运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选器表达式，并将其应用于返回的对象方法。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the object that is returned by the method. 如果使用的属性作为一种安全措施可限制返回，筛选发生之前，必须验证参数值的项的数目。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Northwind 数据库中检索数据和筛选使用其和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using the and properties. 的属性控件应用任何时间执行方法以检索数据。The property of the control is applied any time the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此示例中，属性包含一个筛选器参数，它包含在一个占位符集合。In this example, the property contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 在此示例中，筛选器参数是绑定到的对象属性的控件。In this example, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 因为控件具有其属性设置为`true`中, 有任何更改的选择会导致要发布到服务器的页面和控件重新绑定到数据源控件具有新的筛选器。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection causes the page to post to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 执行筛选操作前发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来验证对值执行操作筛选器参数之前对象执行筛选操作。Handle the event to perform validation operations on filter parameter values before the object performs a filter operation. 您可以取消方法通过设置的属性对象传递给`true`。You can cancel the method by setting the property of the object to `true`. 仅当引发该事件属性设置。The event is raised only if the property is set. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应验证从客户端接收任何筛选器参数值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 在运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选器表达式，并将其应用于返回的对象方法。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the object that is returned by the method. 如果使用的属性作为一种安全措施可限制返回，筛选发生之前，必须验证参数值的项的数目。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

span.span: Gets a collection of parameters that are associated with any parameter placeholders in the string.

value.span: ，它包含与在 属性中找到的任何参数占位符相关联的一组参数。

span.span: A that contains a set of parameters associated with any parameter placeholders found in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的参数集合相关联的中指定所有参数属性。The parameters in the collection are associated with any parameters that are specified in the property. 中指定的参数占位符按顺序计算并与中的参数对象匹配集合时调用方法。The parameter placeholders that are specified in the are evaluated by order and matched to parameter objects in the collection when the method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应验证从客户端接收任何筛选器参数值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 在运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选器表达式，并将其应用于返回的对象方法。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the object that is returned by the method. 如果使用的属性作为一种安全措施可限制返回，筛选发生之前，必须验证参数值的项的数目。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Northwind 数据库中检索数据和筛选使用其和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using the and properties. 的属性控件应用任何时间执行方法以检索数据。The property of the control is applied any time the method is executed to retrieve data. 在此示例中，属性包含一个筛选器参数，它包含在一个占位符集合。In this example, the property contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the collection. 此外，筛选器参数是绑定到的对象属性的控件。In addition, the filter parameter is a object that is bound to the property of the control. 因为控件具有其属性设置为`true`中, 有任何更改的选择会导致页面发布回服务器的信息和控件重新绑定到的数据源控件新的筛选器。Because the control has its property set to `true`, any change in the selection causes the page to post information back to the server and the control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/CS/sql17cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_17sql/VB/sql17vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象用来将数据插入到基础数据库中的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the object uses to insert data into the underlying database.

value.span: 插入数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to insert data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序，这是默认提供程序类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符是`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持的存储的过程。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用控件。The first code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control. 第二个代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索数据，请将其显示在控件，并使用控件以查看详细信息中所选行的和为窗体以插入新记录。The second code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server, display it in a control, and use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用控件。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control. 表中的当前数据显示在控件。The current data in the table is displayed in the control. 您可以通过输入中的值添加新记录控件，然后单击**插入**按钮。You can add new records by entering values in the controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button. 当**插入**单击按钮时，指定的值插入到数据库和进行刷新。When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database and the is refreshed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何从 SQL Server 中检索数据，请将其显示在控件，并使用控件以查看详细信息中所选行的和为窗体以插入新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from SQL Server, display it in a control, and use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. 最初，数据显示在控制和所选的行的还会显示在控件。Initially, the data is displayed in the control and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 并控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与之关联的那个具有并属性，确保所选的行的是显示。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensure that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您单击自动生成**插入**的按钮控件，显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储的过程插入记录，并返回所插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 插入记录，如果会自动填充集合内的值从绑定的列和调用方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推断出正确的参数从任何对象以及参数，以便对象时使用双向数据绑定语法的 ASP.NET。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，通过插入数据后到数据库中，控件事件处理程序调用以处理事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和方法控件显式调用，以刷新的数据。Finally, after data is inserted by the control into the database, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

与之关联的那个具有并属性，确保所选的行的是显示。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensure that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您单击自动生成**插入**的按钮控件，显示了一个不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface that is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储的过程插入记录，并返回所插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 插入记录，如果会自动填充集合内的值从绑定的列和调用方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推断出正确的参数从任何对象以及参数，以便对象时使用双向数据绑定语法的 ASP.NET。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，通过插入数据后到数据库中，控件事件处理程序调用以处理事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和方法控件显式调用，以刷新的数据。Finally, after data is inserted by the control into the database, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来执行特定于应用程序，以验证参数的值或更改之前的参数值的附加的初始化操作控件执行插入操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the insert operation. 与基础数据源的连接尚未打开，调用事件处理程序委托时。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，不能直接通过调用取消数据库操作方法对象，它公开由对象。Therefore, you cannot cancel the database operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 但是，可以通过设置来取消数据库操作的属性到`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索数据，请将其显示在控件。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server, display it in a control. 此示例还使用控件来显示详细信息中的选定行，以及作为窗体以插入新记录。The example also uses a control to display details of the selected row in the , and as a form to insert new records. 最初，数据显示在控制和所选的行的还会显示在控件。Initially, the data is displayed in the control and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 并控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与之关联的那个具有并属性，确保所选的行的是显示。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensure that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您单击自动生成**插入**的按钮控件，显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储的过程插入记录，并返回所插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 插入记录，如果会自动填充集合内的值从绑定的列和调用方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推断出正确的参数从任何对象，以及参数，以便对象时使用双向数据绑定语法的 ASP.NET。The can infer the correct parameters from any object, and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，通过插入数据后到数据库中，控件事件处理程序调用以处理事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和方法控件显式调用，以刷新的数据。Finally, after data is inserted by the control into the database, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要供[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is primarily used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法将还原的视图状态信息对象从保存的上一个页请求方法。The method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式字符串应用于为主键，例如那些由标识`DataKeyNames`属性的数据绑定控件或在删除和更新方案其中属性设置为值和一个设置的`oldValues`传递到相应的数据方法。The format string is applied to primary keys only, such as those that are identified by the `DataKeyNames` property of the data-bound control or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value and a set of `oldValues` is passed to the corresponding data method. 在这种情况下，格式字符串应用于在每个参数名称`oldValues`集合。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索数据，请将其显示在控件，并使用控件以查看详细信息中所选行的和为窗体以插入新记录。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server, display it in a control, and use a control to see details of a selected row in the and as a form to insert new records. 最初，数据显示在控制和所选的行的还会显示在控件。Initially, the data is displayed in the control and the selected row of the is also displayed in the control. 并控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与之关联的那个具有并属性，确保所选的行的是显示。The and controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the has the and properties, which ensure that the selected row of the is displayed. 如果您单击自动生成**插入**的按钮控件，显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the control, the shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record. 该示例使用存储的过程插入记录，并返回所插入行的主键。The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row. 插入记录，如果会自动填充集合内的值从绑定的列和调用方法。If you insert a record, the automatically populates the collection with values from the bound columns and calls the method. 可以推断出正确的参数从任何对象以及参数，以便对象时使用双向数据绑定语法的 ASP.NET。The can infer the correct parameters from any object and a parameter for the object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used. 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。In this example, an additional parameter is added in the event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure. 最后，通过插入数据后到数据库中，控件事件处理程序调用以处理事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和方法控件显式调用，以刷新的数据。Finally, after data is inserted by the control into the database, the event handler is called to handle the event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the method of the control is called explicitly to refresh the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL 查询和命令可以进行参数化，因为它们包含在运行时绑定到查询的值的占位符。SQL queries and commands can be parameterized, in that they contain placeholders for values that are bound to the query at run time. 具体取决于为设置的 ADO.NET 提供程序控件，它由属性，参数计算通过别名或它们的顺序在对象。Depending on the ADO.NET provider that is set for the control, which is identified by the property, the parameters are evaluated by alias or by their ordering in the object. 如果未设置或者设置为，参数计算的别名和属性用于将添加到的参数前缀每个属性对象中期间数据检索或数据操作。If the is not set or is set to the , parameters are evaluated by alias and the property is used to add a parameter prefix to the property of each object in a during a data retrieval or data manipulation operation. 如果属性设置为或，参数按顺序计算并和属性将被忽略。If the property is set to the or , the parameters are evaluated by order and the and properties are ignored. 如果扩展类，可以重写属性不是提供一个前缀`"@"`字符串，如果所需。If you extend the class, you can override the property to supply a prefix other than the `"@"` string, if required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源视图使用方法来检查每个请求的功能，由数据绑定控件，由表示对象传递给方法，并比较这些功能功能，支持的数据源视图。The method is used by the data source view to examine each of the capabilities that are requested by a data-bound control, which is represented by the object that is passed to the method, and to compare those capabilities to the capabilities that are supported by the data source view. 由表示的功能对象并不支持的数据源视图，引发异常。For the capabilities that are represented by the object and are not supported by the data source view, a exception is raised.

summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后 控件的视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves the changes to the view state for the control since the time that the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 视图状态更改的对象，如果不存在与对象关联的视图状态，则为 。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state; otherwise, , if there is no view state associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is primarily used by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of the properties for a server control. 这些值被自动放入服务器控件，这是实例属性的类。These values are automatically placed in the property for the server control, which is an instance of the class. 的保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后的服务器控件随后将保留到字符串对象的值。The value for the server control is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 保存视图状态后，保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后保持的字符串对象返回到客户端为存储在对应的 HTML 中的变量`Hidden`元素。When view state is saved, the string object that was persisted after the save state stage of the server control life cycle is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `Hidden` element. 如果您创作的自定义服务器控件，您可以通过重写提高效率方法并修改`ViewState`服务器控件的属性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the `ViewState` property for your server control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象用来从基础数据库检索数据的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the object uses to retrieve data from the underlying database.

value.span: 用来检索数据的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: An SQL string that the uses to retrieve data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序，这是默认提供程序类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符是`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持的存储的过程。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. > [!IMPORTANT] > 它是更安全地使用存储的过程比 SQL 语句中以便属性。It is more secure to use a stored procedure than a SQL statement for the property. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置基本 SQL 查询，以从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中检索数据并将其中显示的文本控件。The first code example demonstrates how to set the text to a basic SQL query to retrieve data from a Microsoft SQL Server database and display it in a control. 第二个代码示例演示如何设置为要从 SQL Server 数据库检索数据并将其显示在存储过程的名称的文本。The second code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure to retrieve data from a SQL Server database and display it in a . 下面的代码示例演示如何设置为基本的 SQL 查询，以从 SQL Server 数据库中检索数据并将其中显示的文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to a basic SQL query to retrieve data from a SQL Server database and display it in a control. 并控件提供简单的界面来更新中的所选用户的地址作为。The and controls are provided as a simple interface to update the address for the selected user in the . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置为要从 SQL Server 数据库检索数据并将其显示在存储过程的名称的文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the text to the name of a stored procedure to retrieve data from a SQL Server database and display it in a control. 属性可以是 SQL 查询或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持的存储的过程。The property can be an SQL query or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql/CS/sql14cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_14sql/VB/sql14vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性包含的参数化的 SQL 查询集合包含任何对应的 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符的对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string. 具体取决于 ADO.NET 提供程序中的参数的顺序集合可能会很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供程序将根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中出现的顺序集合中的参数相关联。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序，这是默认的 ADO.NET 提供程序为控件，将集合中的参数关联的 SQL 查询中的占位符别名的参数名称匹配的方法。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中 Northwind 数据库中检索数据，通过设置属性设置为 SQL 查询。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database in Microsoft SQL Server by setting the property to an SQL query. 参数化 SQL 查询和中的占位符属性匹配到添加到对象集合。The SQL query is parameterized and the placeholder in the property is matched to the object that is added to the collection. 这样一来，控件，向其绑定，充当什么的筛选器显示在控件。In this way, the control, to which the is bound, acts as a filter for what is displayed in the control. > [!NOTE] > 因为在 WHERE 子句中，将使用参数属性在此代码示例在功能上等效于同时使用这二者和属性。Because the parameter is used in a WHERE clause, the use of the property in this code example is functionally equivalent to using both the and properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象用来更新基础数据库中的数据的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the SQL string that the object uses to update data in the underlying database.

value.span: 用来更新数据的 SQL 字符串。

span.span: A SQL string that the uses to update data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 属性标识。Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the property. 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used. 例如，如果提供程序，这是默认提供程序类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。For example, if the provider is the , which is the default provider for the class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`. 但是，如果提供程序设置为或，则参数的占位符是`'?'`。However, if the provider is set to the or , the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). 属性可以是 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持的存储的过程。The property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures. 值属性存储在视图状态。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置的属性在 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中使用的控件和更新数据控件。The first code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control and update data in a Microsoft SQL Server database using the control. 第二个代码示例演示了如何更新数据中使用 ODBC 数据库控件。The second code example demonstrates how to update data in an ODBC database using the control. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的属性在 SQL Server 数据库中使用的控件和更新数据控件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property of the control and update data in a SQL Server database using the control. 控件自动填充集合中，推断的参数对象，并调用方法时**更新**上可编辑链接控件处于选中状态。The control automatically populates the collection, inferring the parameters from the objects, and calls the method when the **Update** link on the editable control is selected. 此示例还包括一些后续处理-更新记录后，发送电子邮件消息通知。This example also includes some post-processing—after a record is updated, an email message notification is sent. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql/CS/sql7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7sql/VB/sql7vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例在功能上等同于前面的代码示例，演示了如何更新数据中使用 ODBC 数据库控件。The following code example, which is functionally identical to the preceding code example, demonstrates how to update data in an ODBC database using the control. 属性设置为适用于 ODBC 的 ADO.NET 提供程序，和属性设置为 ODBC 数据源名称 (DSN) 的名称。The property is set to the ADO.NET provider for ODBC, the , and the property is set to the name of an ODBC data source name (DSN). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/CS/odbc7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/VB/odbc7vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updated As SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler

summary.span: 完成更新操作后发生。

span.span: Occurs when an update operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理后更新操作已完成的事件以检查的值输出参数。Handle the event to examine the values of output parameters after an update operation has completed. 输出参数中有与事件相关联的对象。The output parameters are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示和更新数据从 ODBC 数据库中检索到控件。The following code example demonstrates how to display and update data that is retrieved from an ODBC database in a control. 已成功更新记录后，事件由一个事件处理程序，以执行后续处理步骤发送电子邮件消息通知的位置。After a record is successfully updated, the event is handled by an event handler to perform a post-processing step where an email message notification is sent. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/CS/odbc7cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_7odbc/VB/odbc7vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UpdateParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取参数集合，该集合包含由 属性使用的参数。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection containing the parameters that are used by the property.

value.span: ，它包含 属性所使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性包含的参数化的 SQL 查询集合包含任何SQL 字符串中的参数占位符对应的对象。If the property contains a parameterized SQL query, the collection contains any objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders that are in the SQL string. 参数名称可能会受到属性; 具体而言，如果名称标识为主键，如密钥的指定，则使用`DataKeyNames`属性，或在删除和更新方案其中属性设置为值和一组`oldValues`传递到相应的数据方法。Parameter names might be affected by the property; specifically, if the name identifies a primary key, such as a key that is specified using the `DataKeyNames` property, or in delete and update scenarios where the property is set to the value, and a set of `oldValues` are passed to the corresponding data method. 在这种情况下，格式字符串应用于在每个参数名称`oldValues`集合。In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection. 具体取决于 ADO.NET 提供程序中的参数的顺序集合可能会很重要。Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the collection might be important. 和提供程序将根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中出现的顺序集合中的参数相关联。The and providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query. 提供程序，这是默认的 ADO.NET 提供程序为控件，将集合中的参数关联的 SQL 查询中的占位符别名的参数名称匹配的方法。The provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query. 有关参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[使用参数使用 SqlDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件中显示数据控制和更新数据时**提交**单击按钮。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to display data in a control and update data when the **Submit** button is clicked. 属性设置与参数化的 SQL 语句和两个参数添加到集合。The property is set with a parameterized SQL statement, and two parameters are added to the collection. 当**提交**单击按钮时，事件处理调用方法显式。When the **Submit** button is clicked, the event is handled to call the method explicitly. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/CS/sql8cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_8sql/VB/sql8vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updating As SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler

summary.span: 执行更新操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before an update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来执行特定于应用程序，以验证参数的值或更改之前的参数值的附加的初始化操作控件执行更新操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the update operation. 与基础数据源的连接尚未打开，调用事件处理程序委托时。The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called. 因此，不能直接通过调用取消该操作方法对象，它公开由对象。Therefore, you cannot cancel the operation directly by calling the method on the object that is exposed by the object. 但是，可以通过设置来取消数据库操作的属性到`true`。You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示从 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中检索到的数据控制和更新记录使用控件。The following code example demonstrates how to display data that is retrieved from a Microsoft SQL Server database in a control and update the record using a control. 该示例演示如何使用对象使用时添加事务上下文控件更新数据。The example shows how you can use a object to add transaction context when using the control to update data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/CS/sql9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_9sql/VB/sql9vb.aspx#1)]
